name: Kaya's heart of Zaandam !
description:
Today I will
show you unseen centre of Zaandam city. Zaandam is the one of the historical
town in the Netherlands, just 15 minutes from Amsterdam. Zaandam is probably
the oldest industrial area in the world and still the centre of the industrial Zaans
region. So perhaps it is not a typical beautiful tourist destination such as
Zaanse Schans but you can find a lot of traditional wooden houses and a small
hidden historical places here and there.
